title: Galicia Nature Haven with Two Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Outdoor Pool
description:
Stay in unique, sun-soaked rooms amongst the trees and indulge in the gastronomic delights of Galicia with a stay atPepe Vieira Relais & Châteaux. This boutique hotel is home to the two Michelin-starred Pepe Vieira restaurant, renowned for its innovative take on traditional Galician cuisine, perfect for gourmands looking for an interactive fine-dining experience.

Each room offers stunning views of the surrounding Rías Baixas, while the hotel's location in the heart of the Rías Baixas wine region makes it a perfect base for exploring local vineyards. For those seeking relaxation, the hotel's outdoor pool and nearby hiking and mountain biking paths are ideal for unwinding.
offer_address: Camiño Serpe, s/n, 36992 Raxó, Pontevedra, Spain
